entry.title: All Windows Users Need to Know This!

media:group.media:title: All Windows Users Need to Know This!
media:group.media:description:
In this video I'll be showing you step-by-step how to use the Windows Package Manager known as WINGET. I'll teach you how to list all the info about every app on your PC, how to find applications in the Winget repository, how to install and update apps using Winget, including how to batch install multiple apps, and how to uninstall any application on your system, including bloatware. As a bonus I'll show you how to install and use the Windows terminal.
Join Me on Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/elevatedsystems
